languages.text: "Э, э, Лорд-капитан! А вы, простите за прямоту, не отхватили больше, чем прожевать можете? Кто вам сказал, что местным такое соседство по нутру придется?"
"Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"
languages.original_text: "Э, э, Лорд-капитан! А вы, простите за прямоту, не отхватили больше, чем прожевать можете? Кто вам сказал, что местным такое соседство по нутру придется?"

traits.locale_text: "Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"
"Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"
"Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"

languages.text: “呃，舰长大人，请原谅我把话说得这么直白。你确定你这么做不是在打肿脸充胖子吗？谁告诉当地人会喜欢这个主意的？”
languages.original_text: "Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"

traits.locale_text: “呃，舰长大人，请原谅我把话说得这么直白。你确定你这么做不是在打肿脸充胖子吗？谁告诉当地人会喜欢这个主意的？”

languages.text: 「あのさ、ロード・キャプテン。率直に言わせてもらうけれど、できもしないことをしているのでは？こんな案で住民たちがうまくやっていけるなんて、誰が進言したのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"

traits.locale_text: 「あのさ、ロード・キャプテン。率直に言わせてもらうけれど、できもしないことをしているのでは？こんな案で住民たちがうまくやっていけるなんて、誰が進言したのかしら？」

languages.text: "Äh, Lord Captain, verzeiht die Offenheit, aber seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr Euch da nicht ein wenig übernehmt? Wie kommt Ihr auf die Idee, dass die Einheimischen diese Idee gut finden werden?"
languages.original_text: "Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"

traits.locale_text: "Äh, Lord Captain, verzeiht die Offenheit, aber seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr Euch da nicht ein wenig übernehmt? Wie kommt Ihr auf die Idee, dass die Einheimischen diese Idee gut finden werden?"

languages.text: « Euh... Excusez ma franchise, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais vous avez bien réfléchi avant de prendre cette décision ? Vous croyez vraiment que ça plaira aux habitants de la planète ? »
languages.original_text: "Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"

traits.locale_text: « Euh... Excusez ma franchise, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais vous avez bien réfléchi avant de prendre cette décision ? Vous croyez vraiment que ça plaira aux habitants de la planète ? »

languages.text: «Eh... Lord Capitán, si me permite hablar con franqueza, ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de lo que propone? ¿De verdad cree que los habitantes de Janus aceptarán este plan?».
languages.original_text: "Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"

traits.locale_text: «Eh... Lord Capitán, si me permite hablar con franqueza, ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de lo que propone? ¿De verdad cree que los habitantes de Janus aceptarán este plan?».

languages.text: "Şey, Lord Kaptan, ayıptır söylemesi ama boyumuzdan büyük bir işe kalkmış olmayalım? Gezegen sakinleri böyle bir durumu kabul eder mi?"
languages.original_text: "Uhh, Lord Captain, are you — pardon my frankness — sure that you haven't just bitten off more than you can chew? Who told you this idea would sit well with the locals?"

traits.locale_text: "Şey, Lord Kaptan, ayıptır söylemesi ama boyumuzdan büyük bir işe kalkmış olmayalım? Gezegen sakinleri böyle bir durumu kabul eder mi?"
